definition: variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: It's one of the most haunting and complex sounds in the animal kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 这是动物王国中最为复杂，最令人难以忘怀的音乐。

sentences.english: Frontline turnover is one of the biggest headaches for call center managers.
sentences.chinese: 对治理者来说，一线坐席辞职是最为头痛的标题。

sentences.english: The crack initiation time determined the composite's toughness.
sentences.chinese: 木粉对裂纹引发时间的影响最为显著。

sentences.english: But in fact it was McEwan's funniest novel for years.
sentences.chinese: 但是事实上这是他数年来最为风趣的一本著作。

sentences.english: Loess landslide is the most catastrophic geohazard in the northwest area of China.
sentences.chinese: 黄土滑坡是西北地区最为严重的地质灾害。

sentences.english: The optimizaiton of secondary leaf base angle seems crucially important.
sentences.chinese: 其中，倒二叶的叶基角改良最为重要。

sentences.english: Of the various forms of discourse narration is perhaps the most familiar to us.
sentences.chinese: 记叙文是我们最为熟悉的一种写作文体。

sentences.english: The 120-degree CCPM is by far most popular among pilots of all levels.
sentences.chinese: 在各层水平的飞手中，目前120度十字盘最为流行。

sentences.english: Operators want the most exciting scenes of the small feeding of goldfish .
sentences.chinese: 最为精彩的要算小金鱼吃食的场面了。

sentences.english: The tragedy of love between Jia Baoyu and Lin Daiyu is a great interest to the lovers of "Hong Xue"(study of A Dream of Red Mansions).
sentences.chinese: 宝黛爱情悲剧是“红学”爱好者最为关注的一个问题。

sentences.english: Instant communication is Chinese Internet most one of all-pervading network application.
sentences.chinese: 即时通讯是中国互联网最为普及的网络应用之一。

sentences.english: This is the most precious treasure of which Dragon & Lion takes the utmost pride.
sentences.chinese: 这是龙狮最为自豪和值得骄傲的宝贵财富。

sentences.english: Sino-American relations belong  to the  complicatedest  bilateral   relations.
sentences.chinese: 中美关系是最为复杂的一对双边关系。

sentences.english: The job attributed to basophils that has spurred the most discussion is presenting antigens.
sentences.chinese: 嗜碱性细胞抗原呈递的新功能激起了最为热烈的讨论。

sentences.english: It is the clearest possible directive to Gaddafi and his cohorts to end the killing.
sentences.chinese: 这是要求卡扎菲和同伙结束杀戮最为明确的一项指令。

sentences.english: And surface reconstruction is the most important technology in RE.
sentences.chinese: 逆向工程中最为关键的技术就是曲面重构技术。

definition: one of (sth)/one out of a multitude/one (third, quarter, percent etc)
very/completely/utterly/extremely/absolutely/hundred percent/to divide into ten equal parts
